lines.text: We interrupt this program again for a very exciting announcement. The duck with the pistola seems to be tied up at the moment. So back to the Mexican Bandstand with nothing but twist music. Everybody twist!

[sitting on the record player all tied up]
Twist he says. I can't even lift a finger.
You want to twist too duck? Everybody twist!
[turns on the record player and Daffy starts spinning around]
I should've taken up bullfighting. It's a lot safer.
